byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: Mr. EDITOR--We had yesterday in connection with the annual examination of the State Normal School at this place, an address on the life, character, and educational services of the late Mr. GALLAUDET, by BARNARD, the Secretary of our State Board of Education.

headline.main: Address on the Life and Character of Mr. Gallendet--Aurora Borealis, &c.
